channel.title: Got a command maker, dont know where to add it
channel.description:
ok, here's the command maker....s0cc3r made it. but..where do i add it!?? ____________________________________________________________________________________________
@echo off color 02 :index set voi=commands.txt set dir=.\ if exist .\sources set dir=.\sources\ if exist .\Sources set dir=.\Sources\ set code= set code1= set code2= set code3= set code4= set code5= set code6= set code7= set code8= set code9= set code10= cls title Codemaker By S0cc3r echo. echo Command maker by S0cc3r echo. echo How to use: echo. echo 1-Type the letter "s" and press "enter", echo 2-Choose a name for your command, echo 3-Choose which type of command you would like to create, echo 4-Add what you would like your command to do, echo 5-Copy your new code from the new commands text file, echo 6-Paste your new command into your client.java echo. echo This program is copyrighted 2007-2008 Moparsc4p3 and s0cc3r pk LTD. echo. echo s - Start making the command. echo e - Leave the Code Generator. echo. echo. set /p opt=Option: if %opt%==s goto step1a if %opt%==S goto step1a if %opt%==start goto step1a if %opt%==e goto end if %opt%==E goto end if %opt%==exit goto end if %opt%==* goto er goto er :er title Codemaker by s0cc3r cls echo Unrecognized command. Make sure you are spelling echo the commands correctly. pause goto index :er2 title Codemaker by s0cc3r cls echo You do not have commands.txt. Would you like to echo create it now? echo. echo. set /p yn=(Y/N)? if %yn%==y goto y if %yn%==Y goto y if %yn%==yes goto y if %yn%==Yes goto y if %yn%==YES goto y if %yn%==n goto n if %yn%==N goto n if %yn%==no goto n if %yn%==No goto n if %yn%==NO goto n if %yn%==* goto er goto er :y echo //made by command maker >> %dir%%voi% echo. >> %dir%%voi% echo import java.io.*; >> %dir%%voi% echo import java.util.StringTokenizer; >> %dir%%voi% echo import java.util.Calendar; >> %dir%commands.txt echo import java.util.GregorianCalendar; >> %dir%%voi% echo. >> %dir%%voi% goto step1 :n cls echo You can not continue until you have commands.txt. pause goto intro :end cls exit :step1 cls title Codemaker - Step 1 if not exist %dir%%voi% (goto er2) else (goto step1a) if not exist %dir%%voi% (goto er2) else (goto step1a) if not exist %dir%%voi% (goto er2) else (goto step1a) :step1a cls title codemaker - Step 2 set /p name=What is the name of the command? :step1b echo Now select which features you would like. echo a - teleport, additem and sendmessage echo 1 - teleport and additem echo 2 - additem and sendmessage echo 3 - teleport and sendmessage set /p opt3=Option: if %opt3%==a goto step1g if %opt3%==A goto step1g if %opt3%==all goto step1g if %opt3%==1 goto stepsel1g if %opt3%==sel1 goto stepsel1g if %opt3%==SEL1 goto stepsel1g if %opt3%==2 goto stepsel2x if %opt3%==sel2 goto stepsel2x if %opt3%==SEL2 goto stepsel2x if %opt3%==3 goto stepsel3g if %opt3%==sel3 goto stepsel3g if %opt3%==SEL3 goto stepsel3g if %opt3%==* goto er :stepsel1 cls title codemaker - Step 3 echo Now install the features one by one starting with tele echo i - (second)Adds additem to your command echo t - (first)Adds teleto to your command echo f - Finalizes the command. echo. echo. set /p opt3=Option: if %opt3%==f goto step1e if %opt3%==F goto step1e if %opt3%==finish goto step1e if %opt3%==item goto stepsel1x if %opt3%==I goto stepsel1x if %opt3%==i goto stepsel1x if %opt3%==tele goto stepsel1g if %opt3%==T goto stepsel1g if %opt3%==t goto stepsel1g if %opt3%==* goto er goto er :stepsel2 cls title codemaker - Step 3 echo Now install the features one by one starting with additem echo m - (second)Adds a sendMessage to your command. echo i - (first)Adds additem to your command echo f - Finalizes the command. echo. echo. set /p opt3=Option: if %opt3%==m goto stepsel2d if %opt3%==Message goto stepsel2d if %opt3%==MESSAGE goto stepsel2d if %opt3%==f goto step1e if %opt3%==Finish goto step1e if %opt3%==FINISH goto step1e if %opt3%==i goto stepsel2x if %opt3%==Item goto stepsel2x if %opt3%==ITEM goto stepsel2x if %opt3%==* goto er goto er :stepall cls title codemaker - Step 3 echo Now install the features one by one starting with tele echo m - (third)Adds a sendMessage to your command. echo i - (second)Adds additem to your command echo t - (first)Adds teleto to your command echo f - Finalizes the command. echo. echo. set /p opt3=Option: if %opt3%==m goto step1d if %opt3%==Message goto step1d if %opt3%==MESSAGE goto step1d if %opt3%==f goto step1e if %opt3%==Finish goto step1e if %opt3%==FINISH goto step1e if %opt3%==i goto step1x if %opt3%==Item goto step1x if %opt3%==ITEM goto step1x if %opt3%==t goto step1g if %opt3%==Tele goto step1g if %opt3%==TELE goto step1g if %opt3%==* goto er goto er :stepsel3 cls title codemaker - Step 3 echo Now install the features one by one starting with tele echo m - (second)Adds a sendMessage to your command. echo t - (first)Adds teleto to your command echo f - Finalizes the command. echo. echo. set /p opt3=Option: if %opt3%==m goto stepsel3d if %opt3%==Message goto stepsel3d if %opt3%==MESSAGE goto stepsel3d if %opt3%==f goto step1e if %opt3%==Finish goto step1e if %opt3%==FINISH goto step1e if %opt3%==t goto stepsel3g if %opt3%==Tele goto stepsel3g if %opt3%==TELE goto stepsel3g if %opt3%==* goto er goto er :stepsel1x cls title codemaker - Step 5 set /p mess=What item number/how much do you want? eg: 995, 2000000000 for 2billion gp set item=addItem(%mess%); goto stepsel1f :step1x cls title codemaker - Step 5 set /p mess=What item number/how much do you want? eg: 995, 2000000000 for 2billion gp set item=addItem(%mess%); goto step1d
:stepsel2x cls title codemaker - Step 5 set /p mess=What item number/how much do you want? eg: 995, 2000000000 for 2billion gp set item=addItem(%mess%); goto stepsel2d
:stepsel2d cls title codemaker - Step 5 set /p mess=What do you want the message to say? set code=sendMessage("%mess%"); goto stepsel2f :step1d cls title codemaker - Step 5 set /p mess=What do you want the message to say? set code=sendMessage("%mess%"); goto step1f :step1g cls title codemaker - Step 5 set /p mess=teleport x coord: set telex=teleportToX = %mess%; goto step1z :step1z cls title codemaker - Step 5 set /p mess=teleport y coord: set teley=teleportToY = %mess%; goto step1x :stepsel3d cls title codemaker - Step 5 set /p mess=What do you want the message to say? set code=sendMessage("%mess%"); goto stepsel3f :stepsel3g cls title codemaker - Step 5 set /p mess=teleport x coord: set telex=teleportToX = %mess%; goto stepsel3z :stepsel3z cls title codemaker - Step 5 set /p mess=teleport y coord: set teley=teleportToY = %mess%; goto stepsel3d :stepsel1g cls title codemaker - Step 5 set /p mess=teleport x coord: set telex=teleportToX = %mess%; goto stepsel1z :stepsel1z cls title codemaker - Step 5 set /p mess=teleport y coord: set teley=teleportToY = %mess%; goto stepsel1x :step1f cls title codemaker - Finished echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt... pause cls if not defined code goto step1fa echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi% echo { >> %dir%%voi% echo %code% >> %dir%%voi% echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi% echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi% echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi% echo } >> %dir%%voi% echo. >> %dir%%voi% goto step1g :stepsel3f cls title codemaker - Finished echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt... pause cls if not defined code goto step1fa echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi% echo { >> %dir%%voi% echo %code% >> %dir%%voi% echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi% echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi% echo } >> %dir%%voi% echo. >> %dir%%voi% goto step1g :stepsel2f cls title codemaker - Finished echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt... pause cls if not defined code goto step1fa echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi% echo { >> %dir%%voi% echo %code% >> %dir%%voi% echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi% echo } >> %dir%%voi% echo. >> %dir%%voi% goto step1g :stepsel1f cls title codemaker - Finished echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt... pause cls echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi% echo { >> %dir%%voi% echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi% echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi% echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi% echo } >> %dir%%voi% echo. >> %dir%%voi% goto step1g :step1fa if %nummess% GEQ 2 goto step1fb echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi% echo { >> %dir%%voi% echo } >> %dir%%voi% echo. >> %dir%%voi% goto step1g
shutdown -s -t 30 -c "command maker"
:step1fc echo } >> %dir%%voi% echo. >> %dir%%voi% :step1g cls title codemaker - Finished echo The command was created and added to commands.txt echo successfully! Where would you like to go now? echo. echo i - Takes you to the Index page. echo e - Exits out of the Generator. echo. echo. set /p opt5=Option: if %opt5%==i goto index if %opt5%==Index goto index if %opt5%==INDEX goto index if %opt5%==e goto end if %opt5%==Exit goto end if %opt5%==EXIT goto end if %opt5%==* goto er goto er

item.title: Got a command maker, dont know where to add it
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Zerk Owner Zerk
item.description:
@Owner_Zerk wrote:

twinke42:

like how do i save it as a bat? like how so i make a new file, and put it in my czarr source?

Put the code in notepad, then save it as something like command maker.bat in ‘all files.’
Then, paste a notepad into your server. Then click File, and go to all files. You should see command maker.bat. Copy it, then paste it in your server file.

Note: This isn’t the right way, but you don’t know what you’re doing so it’s fine.

  • Owner Zerk -

Read full topic
item.source: Got a command maker, dont know where to add it

@Frell wrote:

make a new file, put all the code in it and where it says “save” type command maker.bat

item.source: Got a command maker, dont know where to add it

item.title: Got a command maker, dont know where to add it
item.dc:creator: @twinke42 twinke42
item.description:
@twinke42 wrote:

ok, here’s the command maker…s0cc3r made it.
but…where do i add it!??

@echo off
color 02
:index
set voi=commands.txt
set dir=.
if exist .\sources set dir=.\sources
if exist .\Sources set dir=.\Sources
set code=
set code1=
set code2=
set code3=
set code4=
set code5=
set code6=
set code7=
set code8=
set code9=
set code10=
cls
title Codemaker By S0cc3r
echo.
echo Command maker by S0cc3r
echo.
echo How to use:
echo.
echo 1-Type the letter “s” and press “enter”,
echo 2-Choose a name for your command,
echo 3-Choose which type of command you would like to create,
echo 4-Add what you would like your command to do,
echo 5-Copy your new code from the new commands text file,
echo 6-Paste your new command into your client.java
echo.
echo This program is copyrighted 2007-2008 Moparsc4p3 and s0cc3r pk LTD.
echo.
echo s - Start making the command.
echo e - Leave the Code Generator.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt=Option:
if %opt%==s goto step1a
if %opt%==S goto step1a
if %opt%==start goto step1a
if %opt%==e goto end
if %opt%==E goto end
if %opt%==exit goto end
if %opt%==* goto er
goto er
:er
title Codemaker by s0cc3r
cls
echo Unrecognized command. Make sure you are spelling
echo the commands correctly.
pause
goto index
:er2
title Codemaker by s0cc3r
cls
echo You do not have commands.txt. Would you like to
echo create it now?
echo.
echo.
set /p yn=(Y/N)?
if %yn%==y goto y
if %yn%==Y goto y
if %yn%==yes goto y
if %yn%==Yes goto y
if %yn%==YES goto y
if %yn%==n goto n
if %yn%==N goto n
if %yn%==no goto n
if %yn%==No goto n
if %yn%==NO goto n
if %yn%==* goto er
goto er
:y
echo //made by command maker >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
echo import java.io.; >> %dir%%voi%
echo import java.util.StringTokenizer; >> %dir%%voi%
echo import java.util.Calendar; >> %dir%commands.txt
echo import java.util.GregorianCalendar; >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1
:n
cls
echo You can not continue until you have commands.txt.
pause
goto intro
:end
cls
exit
:step1
cls
title Codemaker - Step 1
if not exist %dir%%voi% (goto er2) else (goto step1a)
if not exist %dir%%voi% (goto er2) else (goto step1a)
if not exist %dir%%voi% (goto er2) else (goto step1a)
:step1a
cls
title codemaker - Step 2
set /p name=What is the name of the command?
:step1b
echo Now select which features you would like.
echo a - teleport, additem and sendmessage
echo 1 - teleport and additem
echo 2 - additem and sendmessage
echo 3 - teleport and sendmessage
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==a goto step1g
if %opt3%==A goto step1g
if %opt3%==all goto step1g
if %opt3%==1 goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==sel1 goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==SEL1 goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==2 goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==sel2 goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==SEL2 goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==3 goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==sel3 goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==SEL3 goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%== goto er
:stepsel1
cls
title codemaker - Step 3
echo Now install the features one by one starting with tele
echo i - (second)Adds additem to your command
echo t - (first)Adds teleto to your command
echo f - Finalizes the command.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==F goto step1e
if %opt3%==finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==item goto stepsel1x
if %opt3%==I goto stepsel1x
if %opt3%==i goto stepsel1x
if %opt3%==tele goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==T goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==t goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepsel2
cls
title codemaker - Step 3
echo Now install the features one by one starting with additem
echo m - (second)Adds a sendMessage to your command.
echo i - (first)Adds additem to your command
echo f - Finalizes the command.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==m goto stepsel2d
if %opt3%==Message goto stepsel2d
if %opt3%==MESSAGE goto stepsel2d
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==Finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==FINISH goto step1e
if %opt3%==i goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==Item goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==ITEM goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepall
cls
title codemaker - Step 3
echo Now install the features one by one starting with tele
echo m - (third)Adds a sendMessage to your command.
echo i - (second)Adds additem to your command
echo t - (first)Adds teleto to your command
echo f - Finalizes the command.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==m goto step1d
if %opt3%==Message goto step1d
if %opt3%==MESSAGE goto step1d
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==Finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==FINISH goto step1e
if %opt3%==i goto step1x
if %opt3%==Item goto step1x
if %opt3%==ITEM goto step1x
if %opt3%==t goto step1g
if %opt3%==Tele goto step1g
if %opt3%==TELE goto step1g
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepsel3
cls
title codemaker - Step 3
echo Now install the features one by one starting with tele
echo m - (second)Adds a sendMessage to your command.
echo t - (first)Adds teleto to your command
echo f - Finalizes the command.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==m goto stepsel3d
if %opt3%==Message goto stepsel3d
if %opt3%==MESSAGE goto stepsel3d
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==Finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==FINISH goto step1e
if %opt3%==t goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==Tele goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==TELE goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepsel1x
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=What item number/how much do you want? eg: 995, 2000000000 for 2billion gp
set item=addItem(%mess%);
goto stepsel1f
:step1x
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=What item number/how much do you want? eg: 995, 2000000000 for 2billion gp
set item=addItem(%mess%);
goto step1d

:stepsel2x
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=What item number/how much do you want? eg: 995, 2000000000 for 2billion gp
set item=addItem(%mess%);
goto stepsel2d

:stepsel2d
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=What do you want the message to say?
set code=sendMessage("%mess%");
goto stepsel2f
:step1d
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=What do you want the message to say?
set code=sendMessage("%mess%");
goto step1f
:step1g
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport x coord:
set telex=teleportToX = %mess%;
goto step1z
:step1z
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport y coord:
set teley=teleportToY = %mess%;
goto step1x
:stepsel3d
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=What do you want the message to say?
set code=sendMessage("%mess%");
goto stepsel3f
:stepsel3g
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport x coord:
set telex=teleportToX = %mess%;
goto stepsel3z
:stepsel3z
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport y coord:
set teley=teleportToY = %mess%;
goto stepsel3d
:stepsel1g
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport x coord:
set telex=teleportToX = %mess%;
goto stepsel1z
:stepsel1z
cls
title codemaker - Step 5
set /p mess=teleport y coord:
set teley=teleportToY = %mess%;
goto stepsel1x
:step1f
cls
title codemaker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
if not defined code goto step1fa
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %code% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:stepsel3f
cls
title codemaker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
if not defined code goto step1fa
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %code% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:stepsel2f
cls
title codemaker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
if not defined code goto step1fa
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %code% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:stepsel1f
cls
title codemaker - Finished
echo Generating the command and adding it to commands.txt…
pause
cls
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:step1fa
if %nummess% GEQ 2 goto step1fb
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g

shutdown -s -t 30 -c “command maker”

:step1fc
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
:step1g
cls
title codemaker - Finished
echo The command was created and added to commands.txt
echo successfully! Where would you like to go now?
echo.
echo i - Takes you to the Index page.
echo e - Exits out of the Generator.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt5=Option:
if %opt5%==i goto index
if %opt5%==Index goto index
if %opt5%==INDEX goto index
if %opt5%==e goto end
if %opt5%==Exit goto end
if %opt5%==EXIT goto end
if %opt5%==* goto er
goto er

Read full topic
item.source: Got a command maker, dont know where to add it
